CRIB_CALCULATE_LSHELL

 [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 

 Name: crib_calculate_lshell
 
 Purpose: Demonstrates usage of basic L-shell code 
          using THEMIS data (calculate_lshell.pro) 
 
 Note: The l-shell code requires the IDL geopack routines

CRIB_TT01

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
  crib_tt01

 Purpose: demonstrates the use of the tt01 procedure.  This procedure
 is tplot based version of the Tsyganenko 2001 magnetic fields model

 Notes: Haje Korth's IDL/Geopack DLM must be installed for this
        to work
        Sometimes these routines can take a while to run.

 $LastChangedBy: nikos $
 $LastChangedDate: 2022-08-18 09:37:28 -0700 (Thu, 18 Aug 2022) $
 $LastChangedRevision: 31021 $
 $URL: svn+ssh://thmsvn@ambrosia.ssl.berkeley.edu/repos/spdsoft/trunk/external/IDL_GEOPACK/examples/crib_tt01.pro $

(See external/IDL_GEOPACK/examples/crib_tt01.pro)

CRIB_TTRACE

 [Previous Routine] [List of Routines] 
Procedure: crib_ttrace

Purpose: crib demonstrating the usage of tracing routines

Notes: tracing may take a while to complete, don't worry it is
not hung.
Haje Korth's IDL/Geopack DLM must be installed for this
       to work
